clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (NY, USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the serviceâ€™s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.

clauses.title: A free help desk is provided
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

clauses.title: Date of the last update of the agreements: May 17th, 2018
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

clauses.title: You must create an account to use this service
clauses.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

clauses.title: Bluemail is only available to users over 13 years old
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

clauses.title: This service informs users that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.

clauses.title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.

clauses.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
clauses.description: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the services. The legal guardians are responsible for the use of the service by the minor.
